definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The accompanying ginger and plainly cooked broccoli also help offset the fat.
sentences.chinese: 配着的姜和简单烧过的西兰花菜也帮助抵消脂肪。

sentences.english: Spinach and broccoli are good sources.
sentences.chinese: 菠菜和西兰花就是很好的来源。

sentences.english: It seems like so much more than, well, just broccoli.
sentences.chinese: 它似乎就这么多，好了，只是西兰花。

sentences.english: sprinkle with reserved red peppers and broccoli.
sentences.chinese: 撒上切好的红辣椒粒和西兰花。

sentences.english: Penne with Turkey, Broccoli, Tomato &Cream Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 火鸡，蕃茄，西兰花尖通粉配忌廉汁。

sentences.english: Add the broccoli and mushrooms, and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 接着放入西兰花和蘑菇，炒2分钟。

sentences.english: Fried broccoli with sliced pork, please.
sentences.chinese: 请来一个猪肉片炒西兰花。

sentences.english: Vege dish is a purple broccoli covered with cream.
sentences.chinese: 青菜是紫色的西兰花，上面滴满了奶油。

sentences.english: Baby Abalone, Scallop, Black Mushroom & Broccoli.
sentences.chinese: 鲍贝，带子，黑冬菇和西兰花。

sentences.english: Bring 2 bowls of water to boil, add mushrooms and broccoli. Simmer for 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 煲滚两碗水，放入冬菇及西兰花煮5分钟。

sentences.english: Broccoli and broccoli sprouts have the highest amount of the isothiocyanates.
sentences.chinese: 西兰花和西兰花芽中异硫氰酸盐的含量是最高的。

sentences.english: Broccoli and broccoli sprouts have the highest amount of the isothiocyanates.
sentences.chinese: 西兰花和西兰花芽中异硫氰酸盐的含量是最高的。

sentences.english: Examples include — salad greens, asparagus, green beans, broccoli and zucchini.
sentences.chinese: 包括有沙拉蔬菜，芦笋，青豆，西兰花和西葫芦。

sentences.english: And the prices for broccoli and cabbage last year encouraged farmers to grow more.
sentences.chinese: 去年西兰花和卷心菜的价格鼓励农民种植更多。

sentences.english: Poach the broccoli as the plate garnishing . To serve with ginger and vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 将西兰花灼熟，以作拌碟，吃时可淋上姜蓉醋。

definition: variant of 西蘭花|西兰花[xi1 lan2 hua1]
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
